Areas

My interests range broadly in Computer Graphics and 3D Modeling, including Real-Time Rendering for Games and Augmented Reality. Some overlapping areas of current activity include the following:

  • Deformable Models
  • 3D Reconstruction
  • Shadow Algorithms
  • Fluid Simulation
  • Game Programming
  • Terrain Models for Games
